ã€Attachedã€‘Zhang Boxue: 'Vice Premier of the State Council and his pro brother of Yumen Oil Mine'
The various articles written on Yumen Oil Mine are as complete and detailed as the oil from Yumen Oil Mine. Is there something to say to write Yumen? Now, talk about a 'Tianfang Night Tan' buried in the depths of the oil mine. 
Yumen oil mine has two brothers and brothers, both before and after being the main managers of the oil mine, are knowledgeable, instrument hall, talented, all have the ideals of the world economy. But their destiny is very different. Brothers are high in the temple, brother is in the depth of hell. And the fate comes from oil, all are the accumulation of Yumen oil deposits, and the Yumen oil mine has suffered a woe. So, I tied this story to the Yumen Oil Mine, just like the Song Dynasty literature documented oil, to history, to evoke, think, sigh, comment. 
The brother who went to the temple is Kang shiying Shien, a well-known name. From leading the PLA to taking over the Yumen oil mine, to being Minister of Oil, to becoming Vice Premier of the State Council, he became a senior party and state leader. 
And this deep brother of hell is Kang shiying Shiying, a little known name. He sent to Yumen as the main leader of the oil mine from the Kuomintang government. By 1949, he gave the Yumen oil mine completely to the Communist Party, specifically to his brother's representative communist party. Since then, a real movie legend in life was staged. Unfortunately, the world did not know that this was not shot. Into the presence of real movie stories into movies. 
Because he is a well-known figure, there has been a lot of his reports in the news and television, and also published biographical works such as the Memoirs of Cang Shien and the Biography of Kang shiying Shien. In documenting the history of China's petroleum development, Kang shiying Shien's name is also always associated with the history of China's oil development, recounts together, so, not to repeat the history of Kang shiying Shien. It is simply to say that in 1949, he led the PLA West into the West and took over the Yumen oil mine by order of the Central People's Government of the CPC. And this takeover was carried out with his brother. The ceremony was how the scene, the atmosphere, no image data left. And the handover of the historical instruments Ken
It must be kept at the Yumen oil mine archives. This is only a cursory explanation of the blood and tears tragedy of Cangseion's brother. 
Because I have relatives with Kang shiying Shiying's descendants, I have a brief knowledge of some of the tragedy of Kang shiying Shiying, but they do not know very detailed. His descendants do not want to touch the history of this pain, rarely tell outsiders about their family, occasionally mentioned, sigh, and very simple, unwilling to say things very thoroughly, they have too many unhealed wounds in their hearts, so I can only say a general, even some details here. Xu is not very accurate, but the overall situation is real and dare to be a little fiction. 
After Kang shiying took over the Yumen oil mine under his brother's jurisdiction, his brother was treated as a meritorious intifada for defending the oil mine not being destroyed and sincerely welcomed the Communist Party and its people's government to take over the oil mine. Arranged to Jiuquan and Zhangye Land Committee to do the work of staff members, enjoying better political and economic treatment. In 1957, the Chinese knew what happened in that year. In the absence of a right, a person who has done business for the old regime is naturally the right. His brother was the right, and in the historical context of that time, it was also natural for the brother to draw the boundaries. The problem is far from there, and doom is escalating. Under the pressure of frequent political movements, every movement arrives to receive a higher standard of treatment. First, he took office, then imprisoned, and then disappeared from prison until his flesh and soul evaporated forever and entered space. The bitterness of the skin, the process of spiritual destruction and the tribulation of the heart is imaginable. The problem is also that Kang shiying Shiying was taken away, where his children do not know; he heard of being in jail, where his children did not know; and he heard of death, where he died, and his children did not know. The counter-revolutionary family had no reason and authority to inquire about his father's whereabouts. Finally, I heard that a prison in the depths of Gobi died in an inaccurate place in the vast gobi. Nature has no affidavit, no relics left to anyone. Where do his children want to look for their bones, vast gobi, Haohao Shahai? 
Throwing a person into the Gobi desert is like throwing a person into the sea and cannot be found. 
It was later known that he disappeared in the place described in the Chronicle of the Edge Ditch. 
In fact, today it seems that people throw into the sea after death, it is buried by the sea, although the flesh into the fish belly, but the soul into the ocean, how deep it is; and thrown into the Gobi, is the Gobi burial, is also an unprecedented burial custom, although the flesh into the wolf mouth, but the soul into space, what is it? 
Are the perfect destination, you can't find. 
I thought of the Tibetan burial. The burial is sacred, holy, chop people into pieces, thrown into the sky, the eagles hover their flesh, the dead become eagles, soaring in the sky. I also thought of the great man's 'sea burial', 'spread the ashes in the sea', the deceased into the sea, with the heavens, the soul directly ascended to heaven, this is how good to create and practice! The children of Kang shiying Shiying should believe that their father was buried after purgatory is sacred by sin, and that the bliss world welcomed him. 
Kang shiying Shiying went to Bliss World, leaving five minor children. In order to feed his younger brother, the boss went to the Yumen oil mine, which brought his father's disaster to his uncle, and became a miner in the Yumen oil mine under his uncle's jurisdiction. At that time, human resources were scarce and went to the oil mine work, did not need to go back door, so instead of walking the back door of Kang shiying Shien to enter the oil mine, but to enter the Yumen oil mine for a livelihood. In order to feed the family, the brother took on the responsibility of his father, and the monthly salary was sent home for the younger siblings to live. In order to feed the family, his brother did not marry for life. At the age at which he was able to marry, he could not marry for political and economic reasons. He was old when political and economic conditions allowed him to marry. So far, the 80s older brother alone, live a sad life. Brothers and sisters also retire in a bullet. They are entangled by the inexhaustible thoughts of their father and the sadness of life. 
When the boss worked under his uncle Kang shiying Shien, Kang shiying also took care of his nephew at work. However, due to the social atmosphere at that time, as a nephew, carrying a heavy burden of thought, there was no 'ambition', as an uncle, style was also well-established, did not use power to promote the nephew's half-duty. Although Kang shiying Shien is a minister of oil and deputy prime minister of the State Council, his nephew worked for a lifetime in the oil system and remained a worker when he retired. This is incredible in today's social climate. 
In 1994, Kang shiying Shien inspected in Lanzhou. He met with his nephew and niece at the Ning Wozhuang Hotel. Family reunion, rarely brisk laughter, air, more coagged, heavy and stuffed, no words also sigh, some words also sigh. Are they glorious uncle's prominence, or are they sighing the sad ending of their father? Only have a taste in the heart. 
I asked the second son of Kang shiying Shiying, why didn't I find the government for his father in 80 years ago or so? He replied that when he felt there was no hope at first, when he felt hopeful, the government department had stopped answering work. Great things, heavy burdens, painful torments, so give up. The muna and honestness of the descendants of Kang shiying Shiying are amazing 
The two brothers of Kang shiying Shien have merit for the Yumen oil mine, and for the country. Kang shiying Shien is a vice premier of the State Council for granted. His brother is unfair to be a wild ghost on the Gobi beach. Kang shiying Shiying, the Kang shiying Shien family and the Yumen oil mine are indelible. 
In Yumen's article, Kang shiying Shien and the oil mine are the objects of praise, while his brother's existence and role are unknown. So when writing the Hexi Corridor series of Yumen articles, leave aside other words, only write the Kang shiying's two brothers, thinks their brother recruits. Let the world know that Hexi walk...
I gave this material to those who aspire to create TV dramas and let them reproduce this history on their screen. Of course, the descendants of Kang shiying's family are extremely reluctant to mention this history, whether they can dig deeper into the material and whether they agree. But leaving a real history is always valuable. (Author is the former faculty of Lanzhou Petrochemical Company staff vocational education college)

[Attached] Wei Chengshu: 'West High Principal Kang xinzai Biography' (network)
Kang xinzai (1906-1978), Shaanxi Hyperlink 'http://baike.baidu.com/view/139783.htm\\ t '_blank' Pucheng people, formerly known as Kang Weike, pseudonym Wang Weiqia. In the 1930s, he served as the teaching director and principal of Xi'an senior high school. 
When Kang xinzai less, he studied Pucheng County Higher School and Sanyuan Shaanxi Provincial Third Normal School. In February 1925, he joined the Chinese Communist Youth League, served as secretary of the Sanyuan Special Branch and organized the Weibei Youth Association, actively participated in the fight against the anti-emperor and anti-warlord Wu Xintian. At the end of 1925, became a member of the CPC. In early 1926, admitted to the Sino-Russian University in Beijing. Participate in the famous 'Three Eight' parade petitions. He was sent to Guangzhou by the Beijing local executive committee of the Communist Party of China, where he studied at the sixth workshop of the peasant movement chaired by Mao Zedong, and served as an officer of the Party's agricultural branch branch. At the end of the study, he was appointed as the head of the Peasant Department Office of the KMT Central Peasant Department. KaiShaanxi students returned to Shaanxi together to launch a peasant movement and set up a peasant association. In February 1927, the executive committee of the Communist Party of China's Shaanxi Gan District was established, as the executive committee of the district executive committee, secretary of agriculture committee On June 1, the Provincial Agricultural Association was formally established, was elected as a standing member and minister of propaganda department, and presided over the work. In early July, the Shaanxi Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China was established and elected as a member of the provincial committee and still responsible for the peasant movement 
After the failure of the Great Revolution, Kang Xin planting into the countryside, organized and led farmers in the area of Jingyang, Sanyuan, Weinan, and organized and led farmers to carry out anti-rent and anti-food struggle. In February 1928, was appointed by Shaanxi Province to Weinan County Committee Secretary, responsible for the preparation of the uprising. He was removed from the post of county committee secretary because of differences of opinion with some people on the intifada. Soon, he learned that provincial committee organs had been destroyed, and that his wife Xu Jiuling was arrested and killed by the KMT Vung Xian warlord, and his sentiment was increasingly depressed, leaving the CPC organization. After leaving the party, he began a teaching career in secret name, having taught in Qishan, Fengxiang and other places in middle schools. 
In November 1930, Yang Hucheng master Shaanxi, sent a group of young people to study abroad, Kang Xinzheng was elected to England to study at the University of London School of Education. Back home in early 1934, first served as secretary in Yang Hucheng Department, then as supervisor and editor at Shaanxi Provincial Department of Education, Xi'an senior high school as teaching director and English teacher. In May 1937, Yang Hucheng was forced by Chiang Kai-shek to resign to study abroad. Kang xinzai accepted Yang's invitation to accompany abroad as secretary. In five months, through 11 countries such as the United States, Britain and France, he recorded in detail General Yang Hucheng's words and deeds, leaving precious historical materials. 
After returning home at the end of November 1937, he still returned to Xi'an High School as a teaching director. In 1938, he was the principal of Xi'an senior high school. As a result of the bombing of Xi'an by a Japanese plane, he led the whole school to move to Nanyang County, Shaanxi, to run schools in difficult and difficult circumstances. Since the fall of 1940, he has been a professor at the Shaanxi Provincial Institute of Political Science, General Secretary of Commerce, Director of Training, Secretary of Education Department of Shaanxi Province, fourth section chief and other positions. During this period, he joined the Kuomintang and the Sam-Youth League and served as an officer of the Xijing Branch and Director of the Organizational Training Committee. February 1946, by Du Bincheng and others, joined the China Democratic League, and was the organization minister of Xi'an branch of the NLD. In 1946, he went to Beiping, professor and secretary director of North China Law Institute, and member of NLD Beiping Branch. 
In early 1949, he went to Yan'an to teach at Yan'an University. With Yang Mingxuan and Li Shuren, he initiated the restoration of the NLD's Northwest Branch and was elected as Secretary-General. After the liberation of Xi'an in May 1949, he was appointed by the Military Control Commission to assist in taking over matters at Northwest University. He later served as a school commissioner, professor and head of foreign language. After 1950, he served as vice-chairman of the second and third sessions of the Consultative Committee of Xian City; the first and second sessions of the Committee of the CPPCC, the third, fourth, fifth and sixth sessions of the Standing Committee, and also served as the leadership of the provincial and municipal committee of the NLD. Has written a large number of literature and history materials. He died in Xi'an on 18 August 1978.

ã€Attachedã€‘Zhao Yiheng: 'Study abroad and send off the future of Kang baiqing Bai love'
The popularity of Peking University has risen, of course, since the May 4 era; among the Peking University students, several particularly active leaders appeared, from Sichuan poet Kang baiqing Bai love as one of them. 
When Shang is a North University student, Kang baiqing Bai love's poems have enjoyed famous. Compared with Hu Shi, Liu Bannong, Shen Yin Mo, Zhou Zuoren and others, a distinct feature is that Kang baiqing Bai love is written poems by poets. Others (mostly teachers of Kang baiqing Bai love), are only in the most difficult genre of poems 'Experiment' is only modern Chinese, the traces of the old body song too deu. Although 'Grass' (published in 1922, the Yadong Library was renamed 'Grass in the Front'), in 117, all in the Peking University study stage, as well as on the way to study abroad, too much hasty. But Kang baiqing Bai's poet temperament is also very eye-catching. Admittedly, the real beginning of modern Chinese poetry will wait for Guo Moruo's 'goddess', but Guo Moruo himself said, 'The real white poem I saw for the first time was Kang baiqing white love,' 'actually surprised and evoked my guts.' In 1922, Hu Shi met Puyi in the deep palace, saw that the stepped down emperor actually read the poem of Kang baiqing Bai love, greatly moved, and encouraged many parties. Later Puyi also wrote several new poems, learning the Kang baiqing Bai style. 
Kang baiqing Bai love wrote a draft for 'trendy', almost a poem, he can be said to be a 'trendy' poet, the first Peking University poet, and the first young poet in the May Fourth Era. At the same time, he is a social activist who has published some political articles in 'Trendy', with vigor and courage. 
In 1917, Peking University first used students to preside over the Professor Council. Four student leaders-Fu Si Nian, Luo Jialun, Zhang Guotao and Kang baiqing Bai Yi-served as the directors of the four colleges. 
In 1918, 'Trendy' was founded, Kang baiqing Bai Ying is an officer. 'Trendy' became the first student publication in the country. Kang baiqing Bai love is a Chinese Chinese society of young people, more active. 
On the night of May 3, 1919, after the Peking University Student Congress decided to march the next day, Chancellor Cai Yuanpei called five student leaders for planning. The 'five leaders' at this critical juncture are Fu Si Nian, Luo Jialun, Xu Deheng, Duan Ximing and Kang baiqing Bai love. After the May Fourth incident received a national response, Kang baiqing Bai Led a delegation of Beijing students to Shanghai and was elected President of the National Student Federation. 
In 1920, the best of the May Fourth Youth went abroad. And Kang baiqing's white love abroad is even more extraordinary-it is Cai Yuanpei's money raised from Nanyang Tobacco Company to personally select several of the most talented people of this year's Peking University graduates to study in the United States. Kang baiqing Bai love and Duan Xipeng, Luo Jialun and others, were sent by newspapers to examine the Constitution 'five ministers out of the ocean' than for the late Qing Dynasty. 
There are many poems on the trans-Pacific boat journey, emotional excitement, a change of 'grass' early love poems lingering wind, to the United States after the 'grass' writing order assembly, presume to be a golden basin wash hands, no more poet, and do a more great cause. Kang baiqing went to the United States, admitted to the University of California Berkeley, studied 'Recent Social Transformation Doctrine', and also worked for part-time work, translation and other subsidized petty money routine. 
However, he is in China's domestic politics, so he keeps in touch with people such as Zhang Wentian, Yuan Tongli, Fang Zhimei and others in the United States to discuss politics. He liaised with the Communist Party of Japan through Japan to the United States and with the US Communist Party, and finally found another political force in San Francisco: the San Francisco Torrent Club, which allowed him to find a chance to realize his political ambitions. His family, Anyue, Sichuan, is one of the power centers of Sichuan Paao, and he is 11 years old, 'participated' in the club. After coming to California to join the San Francisco Hongmen Zhi Public Hall. In July 1923, several Chinese students joined the University of California, launched a new political party 'New China Party', at which time Kang baiqing was 28 years old, turned to become a 'party leader', and immediately set up a party in Chinatown across the West, Beijing and other places Department. And four out to pull international students from various countries, such as Li Gili people who have just arrived in France to join. This 'political party' based on a gangs-based 'party' is a momentous moment. Kang baiqing Bai is returning to the country as a leader to 'mentor', leaving four years of study at the University of California outside the sky. However, since this 'political party' is based on overseas Chinese, Kang baiqing Bai is returning home, it collapses down. 
Living abroad, it should be said, is a critical moment in the development of a person's career, whether academic or not. The so-called 'gilt', that is. From the brilliant college period of Kang baiqing Bai, he could choose between literary and social activities, because he did both well. However, both modern cultural and political circles in China are in their infancy, creating opportunities for talented and ambitious people to stand out, but also to some young people who are actually inexperienced without reading, looking for guidance, and not having to strengthen their training, they can pack the world's false images. 
At Peking University, the arrogance of Kang baiqing Bai has become famous. Every time classes are attended, as usual, late. He attended Mr. Masulun's 'Philosophy of Old Trang' class, not once without being late. One day, when Mathulun is talking about the rise, Kang baiqing Bai and push the door into, the whole class student's vision of production and turn to Kang baiqing. This time, Masulun could not help but ask Kang baiqing Bai why it was late. The poet answered, 'Live too far.' Mr. Ma said angrily, 'Don't you live in the Cuihua Alley? Just a road apart, three or five minutes to walk, why is it far!' The poet immediately said, 'Is not Mr. Zhuang Zi? Zhuang Zi said, 'One is wrong, and this is the right. ' Mr. not think far, and I think far.' Mathulun is talking about the 'white horse horse' there, and Kang baiqing Bai is rewarded with sophism. Mr. Gidma had nothing to say, and had to announce the end of class. 
Of course, there were many students studying abroad in domestic politics, and reunited like-minded people. For example, in 1923, Tsinghua students at the University of Chicago, Luolongji, smelled more and more, promoted 'nalisnalism', organized a 'great river meeting', attended by Pu Xue Feng, He Haoruo and Wu Zelin. There are so many organizations of a kind of club nature, and there is no such ambition as Kang baiqing Bai. 
Admittedly, many foreign students from the May 4 era, entered political activities after returning home, and leaders of North University students studying at the same time as Kang baiqing, almost all of them became political figures. However, Kang baiqing Bai feels like studying abroad as the beginning of a political career, and it seems that no political force can take advantage of it. Such an example, it seems only this one person. 
Note that the May Fourth Movement is not a political event by students demonstrating, but a cultural movement promoted by the professors. These students, especially in foreign countries, seem to be singled out in the world, but they still have to develop under the wings of their former mentors after returning home. Of the five leaders, Cai Yuanpei helped stay in law Xu Deheng later joined the third party and the Democratic Party. At that time, Zhang Guotao, who did not go abroad, became Li's main assistant. Xi Peng has always been a KMT political worker. Luo Jialun became an academic officer of the Kuomintang. Only Fu Si Year belongs to the KMT, but He maintained a certain degree of academic independence. Kang baiqing Bai's overly developed leader's desire has caused him to lose his former teacher figures Cai Yuanpei, Zeng Qi and Li Dazhao, and so on, and the 'New China Party' has also been dispersed. 
After the disappearance of 'his own political party', Kang baiqing Bai can neither return to the United States to continue his studies, nor can it work north. He can only return to his home in Sichuan, who cast warlord Liu Xiang as the shogunate. At this time, he was infected with tobacco addictions, as an official, doing business, and literary. In the forties, he was taught in the Chinese Department of South China Normal University in Guangzhou, and became a right-wing member in 1958, retired from home. On the way, he died in Padang, Hubei, before entering the Three Gorges. 
The mainland intellectuals who were unfortunately wearing the 'right-wing hat' are more sympathetic. Kang baiqing Bai died directly because of the anti-right incident, but never saw anyone to mention it. In addition to literary history written to early new poems, it will be mentioned, some of the words like Kang baiqing Bai, just saying that he 'thoughts are falling behind after his return,' the fact is not so simple. Instead, Mao Zedong himself, may have seen this high-spirited poet at the editorial department of the Peking University Library, so he waved Kang baiqing's strange hat: 'Participated in the Three K Party in the United States.' In his life, Kang baiqing Bai was overwhelmed. In the end, he criticized a country's only Western crime, and finally fell out of fame.
